icon.description: Specifies the material icon that will be shown for action. For more info checkout https://fonts.google.com/icons.

closeButtonText.description: Specifies the default close button text.

hideCloseButton.description: If `true`, hides the default close button.

items.description: The card elements to render inside the `Dialog`.

actions.description: The Actions to show in the dialogs's action bar.

minHeight.description: Specifies the minimum height of the dialog in percentage or pixels, like `"60%"`.

minWidth.description: Specifies the minimum width of the dialog in percentage or pixels, like `"60%"`.

maxHeight.description: Specifies the maximum height of the dialog in percentage or pixels, like `"60%"`.

maxWidth.description: Specifies the maximum width of the dialog in percentage or pixels, like `"60%"`.
